Img_size: | '''Olivia  ("Bryn") Newton-John, and a German-born mother of Jewish descent, Irene Born. Newton-John is the youngest of three children, following brother Hugh, a doctor, and sister Rona, an actress once married to ''Grease'' co-star Jeff Conaway.  Newton-John's mother was the eldest child of Max Born, a German Nobel prize–winning physicist.  Newton-John's father was an MI5 officer on the Enigma project at Bletchley Park and was the officer who took Rudolph Hess into custody during World War II. http://www.merrymedia.co.uk/index.php?option
